Name: Irian Technologies
Description: One of the largest interstellar companies of the Free Worlds League, Irian Technologies was founded in 2182 and produces BattleMechs, DropShips and JumpShips, as well as electronics and other products.
ReputationStatements: Our records show your company as suitable for a special task we have in mind.

MissionSuccessStatements: Mercenaries come and go, you were reliable and effective in the task we gave you.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Not the performance we were expecting but we kept track of your attempts to progress despite the cost.
